abstract: Buckingham Palace releases details of Prince Harry's mid-May trip to United States, which will include visit to storm-damaged parts of New Jersey coast and a charity polo match in Greenwich, Conn.
lead_paragraph: Buckingham Palace has released details of a mid-May trip by Prince Harry, which will include a visit to storm-damaged parts of the New Jersey coast and to a polo match in Greenwich.

headline.main: Connecticut and Shore on Itinerary for a Prince
headline.print_headline: Connecticut And Shore On Itinerary For a Prince
headline.seo: Prince Harry to Visit Connecticut and New Jersey

snippet: Buckingham Palace has released details of a mid-May trip by Prince Harry, which will include a visit to storm-damaged parts of the New Jersey coast and to a polo match in Greenwich....
